GPUBufferGetMappedRange.summary:
The getMappedRange() method of the
interface returns an {{jsxref("ArrayBuffer")}} containing the mapped contents of the GPUBuffer in the specified range.

remarks.para: This can only happen once the GPUBuffer has been successfully mapped with (this can be checked via ). While the GPUBuffer is mapped it cannot be used in any GPU commands.
When you have finished working with the GPUBuffer values, call to unmap it, making it accessible to the GPU again.
